snippet: The 90-board final of the senior team trial for the second World Mind Sports Games ended on Wednesday in Schaumburg, Ill.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the senior team trial for the second World Mind Sports Games in Schaumburg, Ill.
